description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. This is the application to play the guitar to use Xbox360 controller. ･The guitar tone can be switched. ･864 kinds of guitar chords can be used. ･Pentatonic scale display. ･Irregular tuning is possible. ･The display with the TAB score and the piano roll is possible.  ･35 quick codes can register. Save/loading is possible.
description.short: This is the application to play the guitar to use Xbox360 controller. ･The guitar tone can be switched. ･864 kinds of guitar chords can be used. ･Pentatonic scale display. ･Irregular tuning is possible. ･The display with the TAB score and the piano roll is possible.  ･35 quick codes can register. Save/loading is possible.
